mapper.select: WITH cte AS ( SELECT Name, CateCode, Depth,Parent, 1 AS Lv FROM T_CATEGORY WHERE Parent=0 UNION all SELECT a.Name, a.CateCode, a.Depth, a.Parent, b.Lv + 1 FROM T_CATEGORY AS a INNER JOIN cte AS b ON a.Parent = b.CateCode ) SELECT CateCode, Name,Parent FROM cte

WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT LVL_LVL, LVL_CD, H_LVL_CD, LVL_SEQ, 1 AS Lv FROM category WHERE H_LVL_CD=0 UNION all SELECT a.LVL_LVL, a.LVL_CD, a.H_LVL_CD, a.LVL_SEQ, b.Lv + 1 FROM category AS a INNER JOIN cte AS b ON a.H_LVL_CD = b.LVL_CD ) SELECT DISTINCT substr(LVL_CD,1,2) AS LVL_CD, case when substr(LVL_CD,1,2) = substr(H_LVL_CD,1,2) then SUBSTR(H_LVL_CD,3) END AS H_LVL_CD FROM cte
